name: Find the way out!
description:
Press WASD to move around

Left-mouse to attack.

Stage1: Defeat the monsters to acquire the key. Free the magician and open the door to the next stage.

Stage2: Switch between 2 characters by pressing 1 and 2. Earn money by defeating slimes and spiders. Turrets will automatically shoot the boss for you. The boss can one-hit your turret so be careful.

Hope you enjoy the game haha. This is just my first game and it still has bugs, doesn't have a good plot and the gameplay is kinda over-used. Still thanks for playing:).

I would be very thankful if you can write a comment and let me know how to improve:).
